eg.ui

Interface ProjectActionsControl


  • public interface ProjectActionsControl
    The interaface for the control of UI items used for the project actions run, compile and build

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      Disables all project actions (compile, run and build)
      void enable(boolean isCompile, boolean isRun, boolean isBuild, java.lang.String buildLabel)
      Enables or disables separately to compile, run and build a project.
      boolean isConsoleOpen()
      Returns if the console is currently open
      void openConsole()
      Opens the console

    • Method Detail

      • enable

        void enable(boolean isCompile,
            boolean isRun,
            boolean isBuild,
            java.lang.String buildLabel)
        Enables or disables separately to compile, run and build a project. The specified booleans each are true to enable, false to disable.
        Parameters:
        isCompile - the boolean for compile actions
        isRun - the boolean for run actions
        isBuild - the boolean for build actions
        buildLabel - the label for the menu item for build actions; may be null if isBuild is false

      • disable

        void disable()
        Disables all project actions (compile, run and build)

      • isConsoleOpen

        boolean isConsoleOpen()
        Returns if the console is currently open
        Returns:
        true if open, false otherwise

      • openConsole

        void openConsole()
        Opens the console
